description: This file contains unit tests for the Qwik project template initialization, project setup procedures, configuration loading, and template variable replacement in a Python testing framework (pytest). It imports project-specific modules and uses fixtures to create temporary directories, mock configurations, and verify functionality related to project scaffolding.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for testing purposes.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and source files for testing Qwik template application.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a sample ProjectConfig object for testing, with preset attributes.

methods.name: test_qwik_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the template initialization info is correctly retrieved and contains expected commands.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process, including directory structure creation and template variable substitution.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that the post-processing script executes successfully and triggers expected side effects.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks loading project configuration from a JSON file into the application model.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Validates that template variables within files are correctly replaced with project attribute values during initialization.
